pageProps.title: How to Use Generics in Node.js TypeScript
pageProps.metaDesc: Generics are a powerful feature of TypeScript that allow you to write reusable and type-safe code. If you're working with Node.js and TypeScript, you can take advantage of generics to make your code more flexible and maintainable. In this article, we'll explore how to use generics in Node.js TypeScript and demonstrate some practical examples.
